thread.title: Biryani on Broadway

author: Sankara Subramanian (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Biryani on Broadway
text:
Tweet 
Broadway is normally associated with iconic plays, fine arts, stage performances and much more, but in this street photo you will see the Biryani side of Broadway and the influence of India on New Yorkâ€™s iconic street. Do you have some similar pictures from your travels where Indian culture, food and/or people have usurped some iconic streets or places?
